definition: the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)

sentences.english: France's Gendarmerie Nationale recently decided to review its IT infrastructure policies.
sentences.chinese: 法國國家憲兵隊最近決定整改它的IT基建設施政策。

sentences.english: The remaining victim, Boote, was also from the Royal Military police.
sentences.chinese: 另一名遇難者布特也來自皇家憲兵隊。

sentences.english: A mobile guard was posted at the door of the shop, a gun slung over his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 一個機動憲兵隊隊員揹着槍在麪包店門口執勤。

sentences.english: Kato from XianBingDui leave, XiongKuo sea ready to shoot the preparation before.
sentences.chinese: 加藤從憲兵隊動身了，熊闊海也做好了開槍前的準備。

sentences.english: Did the gendarmerie say anything about this inconsistency?
sentences.chinese: 憲兵隊對這點矛盾有說明嗎？

definition: United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
Autumn Harvest Uprising (1927), insurrection in Hunan and Jiangxi provinces led by Mao Zedong
Sun Chuanfang (1885-1935) one of the northern warlord, murdered in Tianjin in 1935
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
